func:
if(flow.get("selected_link_from")!= "" && 
   flow.get("selected_link_to")!= "" && 
   flow.get("selected_link_from") in msg.payload.links &&
   flow.get("selected_link_to") in msg.payload.links[flow.get("selected_link_from")])
    return {"payload":msg.payload.links[flow.get("selected_link_from")][flow.get("selected_link_to")].bw, "timestamp":msg.payload.timestamp};

if(flow.get("selected_link_from")!= "" && 
   flow.get("selected_link_to")!= "" && 
   flow.get("selected_link_from") in msg.payload.links &&
   flow.get("selected_link_to") in msg.payload.links[flow.get("selected_link_from")])
    return {"payload":msg.payload.links[flow.get("selected_link_from")][flow.get("selected_link_to")].lat, "timestamp":msg.payload.timestamp};
